amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to implement any sanction imposed by the United States on the sale of medicine, food, or agricultural products to Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to implement any sanction imposed by the United States on the private commercial sale of medicine, food, or agricultural product to Cuba.

action.text: Mr. Diaz-Balart raised a point of order against the Moran (KS) amendment (A020). Mr. Diaz-Balart stated that the amendment sought to change existing law by imposing new duties and such, constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. Point of order overruled by the Chair.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (KS) amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 301 - 116, 2 Present (Roll no. 426).
